channel.title: coCoKNIght.com - Online Portfolio of Fabian Hernandez
channel.description: coCoKNIght.com - Online Portfolio of Fabian Hernandez

item.title: Shipping - Animated Infographic
item.description:
Shipping - Animated Infographic

Marketing film that explains the processes involved in coordinating supply shippments.

item.title: Frame for Raspberry Pi with E-paper HAT by cocoknight on Shapeways
item.description:
Frame for Raspberry Pi with E-paper HAT by cocoknight on Shapeways

This frame is designed to click in place on top of the E-paper Display HAT for Raspberry Pi. Hang your Pi to the wall or simply put it on a table or shelf. Your Pi deserves some attention. This simple yet elegant frame will transform your Pi into an elegant decoration for your home.

item.title: Black Magic Wand by cocoknight on Shapeways
item.description:
Black Magic Wand by cocoknight on Shapeways

An elegant magic wand for the experienced black magic adept.

item.title: Handle for IKEA Kallax with custom text by cocoknight on Shapeways
item.description:
Handle for IKEA Kallax with custom text by cocoknight on Shapeways

Personalise your IKEA Kallax Shelf with this custom handle decoration for your drawer or door insets. This decoration is designed to click in place on the cylindrical handles of IKEA Kallax drawer or door insets.

item.title: Oliver Birth Pendant by cocoknight on Shapeways
item.description:
Oliver Birth Pendant by cocoknight on Shapeways

The perfect gift if your newborn's name is Oliver.

item.title: minsavist Alpha Gameplay
item.description:
minsavist Alpha Gameplay

Gamaplay of the alpha version of minsavist (working title), a game for mobile devices.

item.title: Girl
item.description:
Girl

Creating a beautiful and fully animate-able 3D girl offers many challenges, and as technology progresses, so does she too. But my goal is not to make her photo-realistic. I'm more interested in creating a character that does not require different versions for different kinds of shots, and that is easy to animate for all purposes.

item.title: Enge Verbindungen machen stark
item.description:
Enge Verbindungen machen stark

For the Raiffeisen annual report 2013 by coUNDco I was responsible for creating the 3D art and 3D animations.
